            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "
              type="button"
              data-insight="reviews-mention"
              data-gtm_provider_id="944957"

                Proactive
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Proactive
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients express a highly proactive sentiment towards Matrix Media Solutions (P) Ltd., noting their collaborative approach and ability to suggest constructive improvements. One client highlighted the team&#39;s engagement and flexibility, stating they worked as partners rather than merely following directives. Their proactive nature was particularly evident in their responsiveness to client needs and their expertise in mobile app development, which contributed to the project&#39;s success and client satisfaction.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="944957"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="82067"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1894514"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Mobile App Dev for IT Services Provider</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">4.5</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 90%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Feb 27, 2021</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              I was impressed by their knowledge in such area of development. They seem to have good experience in mobile app from user interaction and <b>suggested some constructive changes which we never thought about it</b>. I like their approach of working as if they're our partner and their concern over making the app more user-friendly.
            </p>
          </div>

          
          <a
            target="_blank"
            href="/go-to-review/matrix-media-solutions-p/82067"
            title="View Matrix Media Solutions (P) Ltd. Reviews"
            class="provider-insight__review-show-full-review"
            aria-label="Read Full Review"
            data-gtm_provider_id="944957"
            data-gtm_index="0"
            data-gtm_review_id="82067"
            data-gtm_insight_id="1894514"
          >
            Read Full Review
          </a>
        </li>
        
      </ul>
    </div>

      target="_blank"

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Exceeds expectations
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        MindSea consistently exceeds client expectations, as highlighted in multiple reviews. Clients praised their excellent project management, timely delivery, and high-quality outcomes. One client noted, &#39;The end quality exceeded my expectations,&#39; while another emphasized, &#39;MindSea went above and beyond.&#39; Their thorough processes and ability to adapt to client needs were also commended, with one reviewer stating, &#39;They exceeded our expectations again.&#39; Overall, clients express strong satisfaction and a willingness to recommend MindSea for future projects.
      </p>
    </div>

Across various reviews, 100% of clients praised their responsive project management and technical skills, highlighting their ability to deliver on time and adapt to client needs efficiently. Although some clients noted areas for improvement in initial project planning and documentation, the overall feedback is overwhelmingly positive, with clients reporting increased user engagement and satisfaction post-collaboration.

<div class="provider__insights provider__insights--v2 sg-show-more-less__item-to-hide">
    <div class="sg-tabs-expanded">
        
        <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__list">
            
            
            
            
            
                
                
                
            
            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "
              type="button"
              data-insight="reviews-mention"
              data-gtm_provider_id="912548"
              data-gtm_insight_id="974986"
              aria-label="Show company reviews"
            >
                Exceeds expectations
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Exceeds expectations
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Jafton consistently exceeds client expectations, as evidenced by multiple reviews praising their exceptional project management and ability to seamlessly integrate with client teams. Clients highlighted Jafton&#39;s quick understanding of their visions and proactive problem-solving. One CEO noted, &#34;Jafton exceeded our expectations in every way,&#34; while another stated, &#34;Their dedication and technical skills made the development process easy and efficient.&#34; Overall, the sentiment reflects strong satisfaction with Jafton&#39;s performance and outcomes.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="912548"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="292976"
          data-gtm_insight_id="974986"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">IT Staff Aug & UI/UX Design for Digital Wishlist Platform</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Jun 5, 2024</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              What impressed me most about Jafton was their quick understanding of our vision, seamless integration with our team, proactive problem-solving, and dedication to quality. Jafton exceeded our expectations; we have no suggestions for improvement.
            </p>
          </div>

          
          <a
            target="_blank"
            href="/go-to-review/jafton/292976"
            title="View Jafton Reviews"
            class="provider-insight__review-show-full-review"
            aria-label="Read Full Review"
            data-gtm_provider_id="912548"
            data-gtm_index="0"
            data-gtm_review_id="292976"
            data-gtm_insight_id="974986"
          >
            Read Full Review
          </a>
        </li>
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="912548"
          data-gtm_index="1"
          data-gtm_review_id="290312"
          data-gtm_insight_id="974986"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Exceeds expectations
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have expressed that ServReality consistently exceeds expectations, particularly noting their exceptional adaptability and responsiveness. One CEO highlighted the team&#39;s proficiency in integrating complex subscription services, completing the task within a reasonable timeframe. The collaboration was marked by effective communication and regular updates, contributing to a highly satisfactory experience. Despite a desire for more dedicated time on their project, overall feedback indicates a strong appreciation for the quality of work and support provided by ServReality.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="418834"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="208984"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1962988"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Mobile App Development for IT Services Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Jun 14, 2023</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              The developer's proficiency in integrating the subscription service was particularly impressive and <b>exceeded our expectations</b>. Despite the complexity of the task, they adeptly devised a plan and <b>successfully constructed the entire system within a remarkably reasonable timeframe</b>. We were truly amazed by their capabilities and the <b>exceptional outcome they achieved</b>.
            </p>
          </div>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">

      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Proactive
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have consistently noted GearedApp&#39;s proactive approach to project management, emphasizing their effective communication and solutions-oriented mindset. One client highlighted their team member&#39;s proactive management of communication and use of an agile framework, which contributed to a seamless workflow. Additionally, the company&#39;s curiosity and thorough questioning during initial meetings were praised, reinforcing their commitment to understanding client needs and delivering tailored solutions.
      </p>

            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              The member of staff we were dealing with was very <b>proactive in managing communication on the project</b>, and I believe used agile framework to coordinate the work flow.       <p class="provider-insight__description">
        <span class="provider-insight-highlight-rating">5.0</span>
        —  CodeMerx developed an Electron app for a music visualizer software company. They created a wrapper to use Dynamic Lighting in Electron, detecting RGB devices connected to computers and changing

<div class="provider__insights provider__insights--v2 sg-show-more-less__item-to-hide">
    <div class="sg-tabs-expanded">
        
        <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__list">
            
            
            
            
            
                
                
                
            
            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "
              type="button"
              data-insight="reviews-mention"
              data-gtm_provider_id="808025"
              data-gtm_insight_id="1969541"
              aria-label="Show company reviews"
            >
                Exceeds expectations
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Exceeds expectations
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have consistently praised Busy Human for exceeding their expectations, particularly in delivering impressive results. One client noted they aimed for 200 interactions but received 850, highlighting exceptional outcomes. The company&#39;s communication and responsiveness were frequently commended, with one reviewer stating, &#39;Busy Human is by far the best in the way they communicate.&#39; Their expertise and proactive approach were also recognized, with clients expressing trust in their capabilities against larger competitors.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"

    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <p class="provider-insight__subtitle">
        Mobile App Development PROJECT HIGHLIGHT
      </p>
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Web &amp; Mobile App Dev for Robotic Vending Machines Company
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        <span class="provider-insight-highlight-rating">5.0</span>
        —  Memory Squared has developed a mobile app for iOS and Android for a robotic vending machines company using Java. The team is currently developing a web app and optimizing the client’s website.
        
        <a
          target="_blank"
          href="/go-to-review/memory-squared/337527"
          title="Read Full Review on Memory Squared"
          aria-label="Read Full Review on Memory Squared"
          class="provider-insight__highlight-more-link"

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Proactive
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Client feedback highlights Novoda&#39;s proactive approach in project management and communication. One client noted that Novoda &#39;proactively added structure and communication,&#39; effectively identifying potential hurdles and demonstrating deliverable results. Another client emphasized their proactive nature, stating they &#39;don’t have to keep chasing for updates&#39; and that Novoda&#39;s team manages tasks efficiently. Overall, the sentiment is highly positive, reflecting Novoda&#39;s commitment to collaboration and client success.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="141682"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="82972"
          data-gtm_insight_id="810353"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Operating System Development for Digital Art Service</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Apr 2, 2019</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Novoda <b>proactively added structure and communication</b>, which distinguished the team from our previous vendors. They <b>went out of their way to communicate potential hurdles</b> and show deliverable results.
            </p>
          </div>

          
          <a
            target="_blank"
            href="/go-to-review/novoda/82972"
            title="View Novoda Reviews"
            class="provider-insight__review-show-full-review"
            aria-label="Read Full Review"
            data-gtm_provider_id="141682"
            data-gtm_index="0"
            data-gtm_review_id="82972"
            data-gtm_insight_id="810353"
          >
            Read Full Review
          </a>
        </li>
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="141682"
          data-gtm_index="1"
          data-gtm_review_id="69627"
          data-gtm_insight_id="810353"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Android Mobile App Dev for Public Service Broadcaster</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Apr 17, 2018</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              With the Novoda relationship, I don’t have to keep chasing for updates or reminding them of deliverables and deadlines; they are <b>highly proactive and make it very easy to work with them</b>. Novoda work more as a partner rather than a traditional supplier.
            </p>
          </div>

            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "
              type="button"
              data-insight="reviews-mention"
              data-gtm_provider_id="25924"
              data-gtm_insight_id="711531"
              aria-label="Show company reviews"
            >
                Exceeds expectations
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Exceeds expectations
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Appinventiv consistently exceeds client expectations, as evidenced by multiple reviews. Clients praised their exceptional project management and technical expertise, noting that they delivered advanced features and met tight deadlines. For instance, one client highlighted their ability to engage hard-to-reach communities in challenging environments, while another commended their thorough communication and adaptability. Overall, clients expressed high satisfaction, recommending Appinventiv for its professionalism, dedication, and ability to provide value beyond initial projections.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="25924"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="247469"
          data-gtm_insight_id="711531"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Web & Mobile App Design & Development for Nonprofit Org</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Nov 6, 2023</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Appinventiv has over-delivered from day one, and we have exceeded all our goals in very difficult circumstances, engaging users in remote and conflict affected parts of East Africa. Firstly, <b>Appinventiv were able to build advanced features into our minimum value project, well beyond anything that could have been reasonably expected</b>. Second, we were able to achieve the very difficult task of rolling out a trial in remote parts of South Sudan and Sudan, testing and enhancing as we went along.
            </p>
          </div>

            target="_blank"
            href="/go-to-review/appinventiv/247469"
            title="View Appinventiv Reviews"
            class="provider-insight__review-show-full-review"

            data-gtm_insight_id="711531"
          >
            Read Full Review
          </a>
        </li>

          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="25924"
          data-gtm_index="1"
          data-gtm_review_id="244733"
          data-gtm_insight_id="711531"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">

            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>

              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Oct 27, 2023</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              We've found Appinventiv's exceptional development skills and outstanding efficiency to be the most impressive aspects. Their <b>ability to deliver a high-quality app within the set deadline showcased a level of professionalism that exceeded our expectations</b>.
            </p>
          </div>

        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="25924"
          data-gtm_index="2"
          data-gtm_review_id="25268"
          data-gtm_insight_id="711531"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Mobile App Dev for Online Shopping Platform</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">4.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 80%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Oct 5, 2021</span>
            </div>

            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "
              type="button"
              data-insight="reviews-mention"
              data-gtm_provider_id="181039"
              data-gtm_insight_id="819741"
              aria-label="Show company reviews"
            >
                Exceeds expectations
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Exceeds expectations
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Grey Chain consistently exceeds client expectations, demonstrating exceptional performance and project management skills. One client highlighted their ability to meet KPIs and deadlines while maintaining budget adherence. Another emphasized the company&#39;s thought leadership and commitment to quality, stating they deliver results beyond the agreed scope. Overall, clients express high satisfaction, noting ease of collaboration and responsiveness to challenges, indicating that Grey Chain is not only a vendor but a true partner in achieving project success.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="181039"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="177709"
          data-gtm_insight_id="819741"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">IT Staff Augmentation Services for HealthTech Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Jan 24, 2023</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Grey Chain continues to <b>exceed our expectations from a KPI and performance standpoint</b>. They perform well from a project management perspective because they consistently meet deadlines and stay on budget. We’re impressed with how easy it is to work with them, as they’re always willing to resolve our requests and rise to the challenges that they meet.
            </p>
          </div>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Exceeds expectations
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Mobiweb consistently exceeded client expectations, as highlighted by the CEO of Moomenti. They praised the company&#39;s proactive approach, rigorous processes, and exceptional creativity, stating that the project management style fostered an efficient development culture. The client noted impressive UX design and a rapid response culture, emphasizing Mobiweb&#39;s client-centric focus and ability to anticipate needs. Overall, the feedback reflects high satisfaction with no significant areas for improvement identified.
      </p>
    </div>

            <p
                    title="Read Full Review on Techne."
                    aria-label="Read Full Review on Techne."
                    class="provider__description-text-more  directory_profile project-highlight-text"
                    data-link_text="Read More Profile Link"
            >Techne. is a highly regarded mobile app development company that excels in creating bespoke applications for iOS and Android platforms. The company garners overwhelmingly positive feedback for its commitment to client success, proactive communication, and technical prowess, with 100% of reviewers praising their project management skills and dedication to fostering long-term partnerships. Clients particularly appreciate Techne.'s ability to deliver user-friendly and feature-rich applications that align with their business goals.

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Exceeds expectations
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Techne consistently exceeds client expectations, as highlighted by a founder who noted that the final app not only matched but surpassed the initial design and brief. Another client praised the team&#39;s ability to elevate a simple idea into a polished app, stating they received far beyond what was anticipated. Overall, clients commend the exceptional communication, professionalism, and responsiveness throughout the project, leading to a sentiment of high satisfaction and strong recommendations.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">

                Puts the customer first
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Puts the customer first
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Five Pack consistently demonstrates a customer-first approach, as highlighted by Gameday Logistics&#39; founder, who praised their team&#39;s deep understanding of unique business needs and effective communication. The client emphasized that every team member adds significant value, showcasing a genuine commitment to client success. The smooth and insightful Launch Lab meeting further reinforced the impression that Five Pack prioritizes their clients&#39; goals and challenges, contributing positively to the overall project experience.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="38544"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="176201"
          data-gtm_insight_id="775091"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Custom Software Development for Sports Travel Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Jan 16, 2023</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              You can tell it's a tight team, and <b>they genuinely care about the product they are putting together because they want their client to succeed</b>. Communication is great. I don't believe there is a such thing as over communication but if there was, Five Pack would fall into that category.
            </p>
          </div>

      <p class="provider-insight__subtitle">
        Mobile App Development PROJECT HIGHLIGHT
      </p>
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Mobile App Development for Business Services Company
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        <span class="provider-insight-highlight-rating">5.0</span>
        —  Corporation Pop Ltd developed a mobile game for a business services company. The game was designed to deliver a message about inequality in the workplace, so it had accessibility requirements.

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">

    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Exceeds expectations
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Feedback from clients highlights that InventorSoft consistently exceeds expectations in delivering high-quality services. Notably, SayWay GmbH praised the company&#39;s expertise in improving platform performance and user satisfaction, emphasizing their proactive approach and effective communication. Similarly, Shoeby&#39;s Head of Digital commended InventorSoft for successfully sourcing rare specialists who significantly contributed to ongoing projects. Overall, clients appreciate InventorSoft&#39;s professionalism, commitment to excellence, and ability to meet unique project needs.
      </p>
    </div>

      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Proactive
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients consistently praised HZF –– Gamedev Outsourcing Agency for their proactive approach. One client remarked on their excellent communication, stating they were &#39;really on top of it&#39; and posed direct questions to minimize errors. Another highlighted their anticipation of needs, noting that the team offered insightful proposals. Overall, feedback reflects strong satisfaction with HZF&#39;s ability to respond quickly and effectively to client inquiries, reinforcing a sentiment of reliability and attentiveness.
      </p>
    </div>

One client highlighted the team&#39;s willingness to engage deeply with unfamiliar subjects, resulting in a well-received product. They appreciated the effective project management and communication, despite some initial challenges. Overall, clients felt they received excellent value for money and were eager to continue working with DCSL Software in future projects.

    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Proactive
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have consistently praised SoloWay Technologies for their proactive approach throughout the project lifecycle. One CEO noted that the team acted as partners, investing time to find optimal solutions tailored to their specifications. Regular meetings facilitated effective communication, ensuring that progress was monitored and issues addressed promptly. Overall, the sentiment reflects a strong appreciation for the company&#39;s dedication and commitment to client success.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">

            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Nov 13, 2018</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              They made the collaboration effortless. The account manager first divided the project into two-week increments with milestones. At each period’s end, we met to go over progress and address any issues. <b>We also had shorter daily standup meetings to keep both our team on track</b>. We used Redmine to track progress.

    data-is-list="true"

<button
    type="button"

    class="sg-shortlist-bookmark sg-shortlist-bookmark--default"

      </h4>

        Pharos Production Inc. has consistently exceeded client expectations, as evidenced by their exemplary project management and delivery on time. A Director of Communications noted their profound expertise in blockchain and web development, leading to substantial improvements in data security and operational efficiency. The client praised Pharos for their responsiveness and innovative solutions, stating they executed the project with professionalism and attention to detail, leaving no areas for improvement identified.
      </p>
    </div>

<div class="provider__insights provider__insights--v2 sg-show-more-less__item-to-hide">
    <div class="sg-tabs-expanded">
        
        <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__list">
            
            
            
            
            
                
                
                
            
            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "
              type="button"
              data-insight="reviews-mention"
              data-gtm_provider_id="34244"
              data-gtm_insight_id="721880"
              aria-label="Show company reviews"
            >
                Proactive
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Proactive
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        The sentiment regarding Appy Monkey&#39;s proactivity is overwhelmingly positive, with clients noting their &#39;can do&#39; attitude and ability to provide solutions to challenges. One client highlighted the team&#39;s constant communication and proactive suggestions that enhanced the project, leading to a product that exceeded expectations. Another client appreciated the timely delivery and ongoing support, reinforcing the perception of Appy Monkey as a trusted partner. Overall, clients commend their proactive engagement and responsiveness throughout the development process.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="34244"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="287152"
          data-gtm_insight_id="721880"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Mobile App Dev for Holistic Well-Being Provider</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">May 7, 2024</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Regular weekly project calls were made which helped understand the development process and discuss any potential challenges that were being discovered. Any challenges Appy Monkey found, <b>they also presented solutions which we found invaluable</b>. The Appy Monkey team were and still are key partners for ARVRA.
            </p>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">

        Reviews mention Exceeds expectations
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Ars Futura consistently exceeds client expectations, as highlighted by multiple reviews. One client noted the &#39;quality of work has exceeded our expectations,&#39; while another emphasized their &#39;excellent project management&#39; and high responsiveness. Clients praised Ars Futura&#39;s ability to deliver on time, improve existing codebases seamlessly, and maintain a collaborative partnership. Their commitment to quality and effective communication have left clients impressed, with one stating they would &#39;gladly recommend&#39; Ars Futura due to their exceptional performance.
      </p>

            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "

              data-gtm_provider_id="617963"

                Exceeds expectations
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Exceeds expectations
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        SPEEDNET consistently exceeds client expectations, demonstrating exceptional professionalism and expertise. Clients praised their quick responsiveness and ability to adapt to project needs, with one noting that their full-stack developer became an integral part of the team. Another client highlighted SPEEDNET&#39;s dedication to social causes, leading to impressive project outcomes and recognition in the industry. Overall, the sentiment is overwhelmingly positive, with clients expressing satisfaction and a strong recommendation for SPEEDNET as a reliable partner.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="617963"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="292216"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1320650"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Custom Software Dev & UI Design for Digital Identity Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Jun 3, 2024</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              We had a great experience working with Speednet, and there are no areas for improvement that come to mind. Their team's <b>professionalism, expertise, and dedication exceeded our expectations</b>, and we were thoroughly impressed with the quality of their work throughout both projects.
            </p>
          </div>

            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "

              data-gtm_provider_id="1193229"

                Exceeds expectations

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Exceeds expectations
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        WeUno Technologies consistently exceeds client expectations, as evidenced by their work for Dawn.com, where they delivered a modern website commemorating journalists. Clients praised their strong work ethic, exceptional design, and user-friendly backend. One client noted that WeUno not only met but improved upon initial concepts, showcasing their commitment to quality. Overall, feedback highlights their ability to deliver high-quality outputs, even amidst challenges such as the pandemic.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="1193229"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="141327"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1007741"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Web Development for News Media Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">May 5, 2021</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              We were extremely happy with the final site, both for its excellent, modern design as well as its efficient and simple-to-use backend. The data visualizations were far better than we had initially envisioned. As in previous projects, WeUno ensured high-quality outputs while always delivering and <b>surpassing expectations by improving on the original ideas in small and sometimes big ways</b>.
            </p>
          </div>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">

    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Results-oriented
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Techlexity has received positive feedback regarding their results-oriented approach, with clients noting their successful delivery of a fully functioning MVP within tight deadlines. One client highlighted that Techlexity not only met the project standards but also enhanced product optimization, particularly in video loading speeds. Additionally, the team&#39;s communication and ownership of the project were praised, indicating a strong commitment to achieving client goals.
      </p>

            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              The MVP was developed successfully and up to my standard the team has already met the deadline and also <b>elevated in a number of ways to make the product more optimized</b> in terms of speeds specifically they have optimized the video loading in my product. I felt they treated this project as their own as they have started to not just deliver on the Mastoras but also think about it as a owner of the product.

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Proactive
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Inventiff consistently demonstrates a proactive approach in their projects, as highlighted by clients who noted their strong involvement and initiative. One client praised Paul and Victor for being &#39;really proactive and very involved in the project,&#39; while another remarked on their capability to propose improvements, stating that working with Inventiff felt like having a CTO on board. Overall, the sentiment surrounding their proactivity is overwhelmingly positive, with no noted areas for improvement in this regard.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="1792389"

      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">

      </p>

            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Mobile App Dev & UI/UX Design for Broadcasting Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">

              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Jul 28, 2023</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">

        >

    <div id="lm-methodology-accordion" class="lm-only-related-block lm-methodology sg-accordion sg-accordion-large sg-accordion-bordered sg-accordion-contrast">
        <button
            type="button"
            aria-label="Portfolio & Awards"
            class="sg-accordion__title-wrapper sg-secondary-title sg-secondary-title--icon-plus"
            data-dom__data-accordion-status="open"
        >
            <span class="container sg-accordion__title sg-secondary-title__text">
                How the Leaders Matrix Works
            </span>
        </button>

        <div class="container sg-accordion__contents">
            <div class="lm-methodology__column-1">
                <p class="lm-methodology__text">
                    A Clutch Leaders Matrix provides a broad view of the top-performing companies in a particular service or
                    location. Each company featured in a Leaders Matrix is evaluated based on Focus and Ability to Deliver.
                    The size of each circle indicates that company’s size.

                    <a
                        target="_blank"
                        href="https://clutch.co/methodology"
                        title="Learn More about Leaders Matrix Methodology"
                        class="lm-methodology__link"
                        aria-label="Click LM Methodology Learn More"
                        data-gtm_event_category="click_lm_methodology_learn_more"
                    >
                        Learn More
                    </a>
                </p>
            </div>
            <div class="lm-methodology__column-2">
                <p class="lm-methodology__heading-small"><b>Focus</b> (x-axis)</p>

                <p class="lm-methodology__text">Focus accounts for a company’s specialization within a certain service.</p>

                <p class="lm-methodology__heading-small"><b>Ability to Deliver</b> (y-axis)</p>

                <p class="lm-methodology__text">Ability to Deliver considers three criteria:</p>

                <ol class="lm-methodology__list">
                    <li class="lm-methodology__list-item">Client feedback and reviews</li>
                    <li class="lm-methodology__list-item">Work experience and previous projects</li>
                    <li class="lm-methodology__list-item">Market presence and reputation in the industry</li>
                </ol>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

    </div>
